alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brown and east central Coleman Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 701 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thrifty, or near Bangs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Brownwood, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty, Lake Brownwood State Park, Owens and Thrifty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Flooding of low lying areas, and low water crossings is possible.
